title: Baseball Data - MLB - Stats - Player (Hitting) - 2020 Regular Season Home Run Leaders
custom_steps: WHEN user executes a GET request to https://statsapi.mlb.com/api/v1/stats?season=2020&sportId=1&stats=season&group=hitting&gameType=R&limit=50&offset=0&sortStat=homeRuns&order=desc&playerPool=Qualified
custom_expected: THEN the returned JSON object adheres to the Pact.IO consumer contract

title: Baseball Data - MLB - Stats - Player (Last X Games) - 2020 Regular Season Yasmani Grandal
custom_steps: WHEN user executes a GET request to https://statsapi.mlb.com/api/v1/people/518735/stats?stats=lastXGames&season=2020&group=hitting,pitching&limit=7
